p: Although the confidence level for the separation of the 2 sublineages differs depending on the model used (posterior probabilities range from 0.63 for HKY+Γ relaxed clock to 0.89 for GTR+Γ+I relaxed clock), the bifurcation of the 2 sublineages occurs in all of the trees produced ( Figure 2; Appendix Figures 1–5). Furthermore, an analysis of 32 nsP3 sequences (1,650 nt) similarly demonstrates the bifurcation of the 2 proposed sublineages but with high posterior probability (≈1) for each of the HKY and GTR+Γ+I substitutional models with both strict and relaxed clocks. The tree for nsP3 based on the HKY substitution model with a strict clock ( Figure 3) is also presented with alternative substitution models and clocks ( Appendix Figures 6–8).
